projects.title: Twitter Clone
projects.description: Worked with a team of 5 people to develop the front-end of a Twitter clone application using ReactJS, Tailwind and Material-UI and then integrated with the backend team.

projects.title: E-Commerce Website
projects.description: Contributed to backend API development and designed the database schema using MySQL for efficient data storage and retrieval, optimizing performance and scalability

projects.title: Search Engine
projects.description: Developed a fully functional search engine using Java, Spring Boot, ReactJS, and MongoDB. With a ranker using TF-IDF to sort web pages based on relevance and popularity, enhancing the search engine's effectiveness.

certificates.title: Web Development | Harvard University
certificates.description: Designed web apps with Python, JavaScript, and SQL using frameworks like Django, React, and Bootstrap.

certificates.title: Cybersecurity Summer Training
certificates.description: Got a thorough intro to cyber security, networks, cryptography and number theory.

certificates.title: Micro-Mouse Competition
certificates.description: Ranked 1st place in the Micro-Mouse line follower and maze competition.

certificates.title: Engineering Mathematics Research
certificates.description: Ranked 1st place in the 8th Undergraduate Engineering Mathematics Research Forum.
